mapper.sql: id, name, password, age, sex, birthday, create_time, update_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, name, password, age, sex, birthday, create_time, update_time, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into user
id,
name,
password,
age,
sex,
birthday,
create_time,
update_time,
status,

mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
